title: In Xi Jinping’s Purge of the Military, a Search for Absolute Loyalty
summary_full: By reaching back to Maoist tactics of “rectification,” the Chinese leader is signaling that control over the gun requires a state of perpetual cleansing.
summary_public: By reaching back to Maoist tactics of “rectification,” the Chinese leader is signaling that control over the gun requires a state of perpetual cleansing.
